(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP They))
    (VP (MD should)
      (VP (VB make)
        (NP (DT this) (JJ little) (NNP Hainanese) (NNP Coffeeshop))
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP
            (NP (NNP Coronation) (NNP Plaze))
            (NP (DT a) (NNP Heritage) (NNP Site))))))
    (. !)))

aux(make-3, should-2)
root(ROOT-0, make-3)
det(Coffeeshop-7, this-4)

nn(Coffeeshop-7, Hainanese-6)
dobj(make-3, Coffeeshop-7)
prep(make-3, in-8)
nn(Plaze-10, Coronation-9)
pobj(in-8, Plaze-10)
det(Site-13, a-11)
nn(Site-13, Heritage-12)
dep(Plaze-10, Site-13)

  (SBAR (IN If)
    (S
      (NP (PRP you))
      (ADVP (RB really))
      (VP (VBP want)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB re-live)
              (NP (DT the) (JJ good) (JJ old) (NNS days))))
          (, ,))))))

  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP It))
      (VP (VBD was)

          (SBAR (IN that)
            (SINV
              (VP (VBD wrote)
                (PRT (RP in))

                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB tell)
                      (NP (PRP me))

                        (NP (DT this) (NN Beef)))))))

              (NP (DT the) (NN gem))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP
      (VP (VBP have)
        (VP (VBN been)
          (VP (VBG lamenting)
            (PP (IN about)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (NN lack))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP
                    (NP (NNP Wok) (NNP Hei) (NNP Flavour))
                    (PP (IN in)
                      (NP (NNP Hor) (NNP Fun)))))))
            (PP (IN since)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (NN start))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (DT this) (NN blog))))))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VBD was)
        (ADJP (VBN surprised)
          (SBAR (IN that)
            (S
              (NP (PRP I))
              (ADVP (RB finally))
              (VP (VBD managed)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB find)

                        (WHNP (WP what))
                        (S
                          (NP (PRP I))
                          (VP (VBD was)
                            (VP (VBG looking)
                              (PP (IN for) (IN in)
                                (NP
                                  (NP (DT the) (RBS most) (JJ unusual))

                                    (NP (NNS places))))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

            (ADVP (RB actually))))

      (PP (IN with)

          (NP (DT the) (NN price))

            (NP
              (NP (PRP$ my) (NN plate))
              (PP (IN of)

    (. .)))

prep(plate-7, of-8)
nn(Fun-11, Beef-9)
nn(Fun-11, Hor-10)
pobj(of-8, Fun-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBP have)
        (VP (VBN had)
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP (NNS ages))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (DT the) (JJ whole) (NN experience))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (ADVP (RB definitely))
        (VP (RB not)
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB be)
                (VP (VBN missed))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(had-3, I-1)
aux(had-3, have-2)
root(ROOT-0, had-3)
prep(had-3, in-4)
pobj(in-4, ages-5)
cc(had-3, and-6)
det(experience-9, the-7)
amod(experience-9, whole-8)
nsubj(not-12, experience-9)
aux(not-12, is-10)
advmod(not-12, definitely-11)
conj(had-3, not-12)
aux(missed-15, to-13)
auxpass(missed-15, be-14)
xcomp(not-12, missed-15)


(ROOT
  (NP (NNP Update) (: :)))


root(ROOT-0, Update-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (CD 15) (NNP August) (JJ 2011This) (NN restaurant))
    (VP (VBZ has)
      (VP (VBN shifted)
        (PP (TO to)
          (NP (NNP 249) (NNP Beach) (NNP Road)))))))


num(restaurant-4, 15-1)
nn(restaurant-4, August-2)
amod(restaurant-4, 2011This-3)
nsubj(shifted-6, restaurant-4)
aux(shifted-6, has-5)
root(ROOT-0, shifted-6)
prep(shifted-6, to-7)
nn(Road-10, 249-8)
nn(Road-10, Beach-9)
pobj(to-7, Road-10)
